knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```


```{r}
homerange <- read_csv("Tamburelloetal_HomeRangeDatabase.csv") %>% clean_names()
```

```{r}
homerange %>% 
  select(class, log10_mass) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=class, y=log10_mass)) +
  geom_boxplot()+
  coord_flip()
```

```{r}
homerange %>% 
  group_by(class) %>% 
  select(class, log10_mass) %>% 
  summarize(max_mass=max(log10_mass)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=class, y=max_mass)) +
  geom_col()+
  coord_flip()
```

```{r}
homerange %>% 
  group_by(class) %>% 
  select(class, log10_mass) %>% 
  summarize(min_mass=min(log10_mass)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=class, y=min_mass)) +
  geom_col()+
  coord_flip()
```
```{r}
homerange %>% 
  group_by(class) %>% 
  select(class, log10_mass) %>% 
  summarize(mean_mass=mean(log10_mass)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=class, y=mean_mass)) +
  geom_col()+
  coord_flip()
```
